snippet: The former FIFA president João Havelange and the former Brazilian soccer leader Ricardo Teixeira received millions of dollars in World Cup kickbacks, FIFA confirmed.
abstract: FIFA confirms that former president Joao Havelange and the former Brazilian soccer leader Ricardo Teixeira received millions of dollars in World Cup kickbacks; publishes a Swiss court dossier that says payments attributed to accounts connected to the two men totaled almost $22 million from 1992 to 2000.
lead_paragraph: The former FIFA president João Havelange and the former Brazilian soccer leader Ricardo Teixeira received millions of dollars in World Cup kickbacks, FIFA confirmed.

headline.seo: Former FIFA Head Took Bribes, FIFA says
headline.main: Former FIFA Head Took Bribes, FIFA says
